markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Thundering Dominance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1018)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** your  companion  or  eidolon 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura and amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the Thundering Roar action.

 **Thundering Roar** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The target unleashes a powerful vocalization. Each enemy in a 10- foot emanation takes 4d8 sonic damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save against your spell DC. A creature that fails its Will save is also [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus to Intimidation checks increases by 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8th-level spell), and the damage from the roar increases by 2d8.
name: Thundering Dominance
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** your [companion](AnimalCompanions.aspx) or [eidolon](Eidolons.aspx)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make your companion or eidolon intimidating and let it emit a sonic roar.
</summary>
summary: Make your companion or eidolon intimidating and let it emit a sonic roar.
summary_markdown: Make your companion or eidolon intimidating and let it emit a sonic roar.
text: Thundering Dominance Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 136 2.0 Traditions Occult, Primal Cast somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target your companion or eidolon Duration 1 minute --- You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura and amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the Thundering Roar action. Thundering Roar Single Action (auditory, concentrate, emotion, enchantment, fear, flourish, mental, sonic) The target unleashes a powerful vocalization. Each enemy in a 10- foot emanation takes 4d8 sonic damage with a basic Will save against your spell DC. A creature that fails its Will save is also frightened 1. --- Heightened (+2) The status bonus to Intimidation checks increases by 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8th-level spell), and the damage from the roar increases by 2d8.
